body:
It looks like redundant mirrors are needed for nasm:

```
ERROR: /home/tom/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tom/0eaf2b6b7a8618527eb96256b130e46f/external/jpeg/BUILD:162:1: no such package '@nasm//': Error downloading [http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2] to /home/tom/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tom/0eaf2b6b7a8618527eb96256b130e46f/external/nasm/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2: Connection refused (Connection refused) and referenced by '@jpeg//:simd_x86_64_assemblage23'.
ERROR: /home/tom/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tom/0eaf2b6b7a8618527eb96256b130e46f/external/jpeg/BUILD:162:1: no such package '@nasm//': Error downloading [http://www.nasm.us/pub/nasm/releasebuilds/2.12.02/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2] to /home/tom/.cache/bazel/_bazel_tom/0eaf2b6b7a8618527eb96256b130e46f/external/nasm/nasm-2.12.02.tar.bz2: Connection refused (Connection refused) and referenced by '@jpeg//:simd_x86_64_assemblage23'.
```
